pr_title: Change APK base name depending on the branch name for debug builds

timeline.message:
Change APK base name depending on the branch name for debug builds


a

timeline.bodyText:
Better to use normalizedWorkingBranch, as workingBranch could contain special characters not allowed in filenames.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            archivesBaseName = 'NewPipe_' + workingBranch
          
          
            
                            archivesBaseName = 'NewPipe_' + normalizedWorkingBranch
timeline.author: Stypox
